name: Globazon
description:
As a GlobeAzon employee you must control your state-of-the-art GlobAzon packing robot to pack and ship as many customer orders as you can! Be careful though, the more orders you mess up the lower of a rating you get and you'll be FIRED! Your Goal is to ship 5 boxes in 2 minutes. Each box has its packing list shown above it. When a box is packed, grab it and put it in the corresponding colored tube to ship it! Move by clicking on the carpet. Pick up items with Q and E. Drag and drop the icons over Tater's hands to twist and contort him in interesting ways.

Artists! Jessica Bailer and Paul Ethridge Code! Ryan Kline Music! David Zagardo
